com.dhemery.polling

Class SystemClockTicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.polling.SystemClockTicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ticker

    public class SystemClockTicker
extends Object
implements Ticker

    A ticker that uses the system clock to reckon time. The ticker has a duration and a tick size, both in milliseconds.

    The ticker expires at its start time plus its duration.

    Note that even after the ticker expires, it will continue to tick when requested.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemClockTicker(long durationInMilliseconds)
      Create a ticker with the given duration and a tick size of one second.
      SystemClockTicker(long durationInMilliseconds, long tickSizeInMilliseconds)
      Create a ticker with the given duration and tick size.
